lines.text: What makes Palkia part water anyway?
Like, what part of the distorter of space says water type?
Dialga and Palkia are pretty intimidating, but have you SEEN Giratina?
That thing is the ruler of the Distortion World, a literal demon!
And its Origin Form? The fuel of nightmares!
We want to...wait, what's our motive again?
I think it's something to do with space...maybe Pluto?
Yeah, that's it! We want Pluto to be a planet again!
